price: O you who believe, seek help in patience and prayer, for Allah is with those who are patient[67].
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱسۡتَعِينُواْ بِٱلصَّبۡرِ وَٱلصَّلَوٰةِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلصَّٰبِرِينَ
footnotes: [67] Allah is with them; by guiding and supporting them.
